page.title: 11GOING SWIMMING
page.content: Every Saturday I go to Bletchly swimming pool,it has a wave machine and a slide, you have to be careful because you might bang your head on the end.In the swimming pool they have Palm trees in the middle,and they have a bar so when you get out you can sit at the table and chairs and have a drink.You can have a very luxurious time and after you can go to park.The park has a pond or you can stand on the bridge and look over Bletchly.You can see the cinema and the market and lots of shop and supermarkets and all the birds that fly over the bridge.The bridge is like a long tunnel.My Mum and I go there a lot and the water is as warm as a bath.
